project1.title: ATM Withdrawal Simulation
project1.description: A command-line application built with C# that simulates the process of withdrawing cash from an ATM. Calculates banknote denominations.
project1.challenges: Handling edge cases, calculation logic. Improved algorithm and input handling understanding.

project2.title: Objednávka Trička (T-Shirt Order Form)
project2.description: A simple web form using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for ordering custom t-shirts. Includes client-side validation.
project2.challenges: Implementing client-side validation, cross-browser form elements. Practiced DOM manipulation.

project3.title: Interactive Keyboard Layout
project3.description: A visual representation of a keyboard layout created with HTML and CSS, focusing on semantic structure and styling.
project3.challenges: Accurate key positioning with CSS layouts. Reinforced HTML structure and CSS selector knowledge.
